DOC.brief_summary: This pilot-study aim evaluate effect size feasibility internet-delivered cognitive behavior therapy ( ICBT ) child ( age 8-12 year ) pain-predominant functional gastrointestinal disorder ( e.g . irritable bowel syndrome , functional abdominal pain functional dyspepsia accord Rome III criterion ) . The main component investigate study exposure gastrointestinal symptom fear stimuli situation . Children participate along one parent treatment . The parent also receive specific module information support child treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Internet-delivered CBT Children With Functional Gastrointestinal Disorders - Open Pilot Study
DOC.criteria: Children 812 year ( 13th birthday ) diagnose diagnosis irritable bowel syndrome , functional dyspepsia functional abdominal pain accord Rome III criterion . Any psychopharmacological medication stable since 1 month . Parents child need master Swedish , access computer internet access , willing participate 10 week treatment homework . Simultaneous presence serious somatic disease / child meet criteria organic disease well explain symptom . Psychiatric social problem consider serious need intense treatment ICBT lead exclusion .
